author: Lukas Reiter
script:
"""
This script extracts all cookie information from in-scope HTTP responses and adds
the information to the table above.
"""
# Do the initial setup
if ref == 1 or "attributes" not in session:
	session["attributes"] = get_cookie_attributes()
	header = ["Ref.", "URL"]
	header.extend(session["attributes"])

# Process only in-scope HTTP responses
response = message_info.getResponse()
if in_scope and response:
	response_info = helpers.analyzeResponse(response)
	cookies = get_cookies(response_info)
	for cookie in cookies:
		row = [ref, url]
		for key in session["attributes"]:
			value = cookie[key] if cookie[key] is not None else ""
			row.append(value)
		rows.append(row)
name: Cookie - Template Script to Extract Cookie Information From HTTP Responses
